content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-10.5, 25.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5), boiler (position not specified), and steam engine (position not specified).

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a furnace at position (-18.0, -49.0)

### Iron plate factory at position(5.0, -73.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a furnace at position (5.0, -73.0)

### Electricity network
Consists of the following entities:
- Electricity poles at positions (-18.5, 18.5), (-16.5, 18.5), (-16.5, 19.5), (-20.5, 20.5), (-20.5, 18.5), (-19.5, 20.5)
- Additional electricity poles at positions (-23.5, 23.5), (-20.5, 22.5), (-21.5, 22.5), (-13.5, 25.5), (-23.5, 26.5), (-22.5, 27.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to access entities that do not exist
- Ensure that the entity you are trying to access is present at the specified position. In this case, the lab was not found at position (-17.5, 23.5).

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
